#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#include <stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
long long gcd(long long a, long long b){
	if(b==0)
	return a;
	return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
	long long t,i,j,k,l,m,n,x1,x2,y1,y2;
	string str;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
		m = fabs(x1-x2);
		n = fabs(y1-y2);
		if((gcd(m,n)-1 == 0) || (gcd(m,n)-1==-1))
		cout<<"0"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<gcd(m,n)-1<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
